zh-TW.banner_alt: 追求你所熱愛 努力不懈
zh-TW.story_subheading: 覓食國際餐飲企業有限公司
zh-TW.story_p1: 乃是由一群對餐旅事業有高度熱忱的青年所組成。
zh-TW.story_p2: 「覓食」的命名乃是以英文 Miss 的諧音作為發想，其意涵有想念、饗宴、回味無窮之意。
zh-TW.story_p3: 「覓食」成立的使命是以台灣的本土化美食為依歸，推廣與行銷在地美食，提高台灣美食能見度。
zh-TW.story_p4: 傳承好味道並讓傳統文化延續。
zh-TW.story_p5: 「覓食」藉此激發顧客對台灣美食文化的熱愛，亦引領餐飲從業人員對餐飲服務之重視。
zh-TW.story_commitment: 「覓食」承諾將會借助過去集團品牌及成功案例推行的經驗，協助想轉型、想創業，或是已有不錯的成果，但想更進一步的店家做改善。也行銷團隊在地美食，讓台灣美食走出去，為客戶提供高品質的餐飲體驗。
zh-TW.vision_text:
「覓食」致力於發掘台灣美食，
透過不斷創新和品牌管理，
將臺灣的美食文化發揚光大。
zh-TW.footerSlogan:
讓覓食餐飲陪你一起成長
用台灣美食帶給人們笑容
zh-TW.contact_subtitle: 我們期待與您一同激盪出品牌的無限可能，共創雙贏的未來。
zh-TW.contact_form_description: 歡迎透過以下方式與我們取得聯繫
zh-TW.feature_brand_strategy_desc:
專業品牌規劃
與市場定位
zh-TW.feature_operation_diagnosis_desc:
深度營運分析
與優化建議
zh-TW.feature_management_consultant_desc:
專業團隊輔導
與流程優化
zh-TW.map_subtitle: 歡迎親臨我們的辦公室，與我們面對面討論您的需求

en.banner_alt: Pursue what you love, work tirelessly.
en.story_subheading: MISS International Catering Enterprise Co., Ltd.
en.story_p1: Composed of a group of young people with a high degree of enthusiasm for the restaurant and travel industry.
en.story_p2: The name 'Miss' (mì shí) is a homophone of the English word 'Miss', which implies missing, feasting, and lingering flavors.
en.story_p3: The mission of 'Miss' is to base itself on Taiwan's local cuisine, promote and market local food, and increase the visibility of Taiwanese cuisine.
en.story_p4: Inheriting good tastes and continuing traditional culture.
en.story_p5: 'Miss' aims to stimulate customers' love for Taiwanese food culture and lead catering practitioners to value catering services.
en.story_commitment: 'Miss' promises to leverage the experience of past group brands and successful cases to assist stores that want to transform, start a business, or have achieved good results but want to improve further. It also markets local food, taking Taiwanese cuisine to the world and providing customers with a high-quality dining experience.
en.vision_text:
'Miss' is dedicated to discovering Taiwanese delicacies.
Through continuous innovation and brand management,
we will promote Taiwan's food culture.
en.footerSlogan:
Let MISS catering grow with you
Bringing smiles to people with Taiwanese cuisine
en.contact_subtitle: We look forward to working with you to create unlimited brand possibilities and a win-win future.
en.contact_form_description: We welcome you to get in touch with us through any of the following ways
en.map_subtitle: Welcome to visit our office and discuss your needs with us face to face
en.transport_info: 5 minutes walk from Guting MRT Station
